actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 203 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide for State certification.

summary.text: Provides for certification by the State water pollution control agency of treatment projects within such State where the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency determines that such projects will be carried out in accordance with State laws and standards at least equivalent to those established by Federal law.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 203 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide for State certification.
